h3_title: Poison Chief Fights and Boss Guides
content: You can expect it to throw out little orbs of poison continuously, covering the surrounding area and inflicting Poison Damage. Equip Antimiasma Powder so you can quickly use it if you get caught in one too many attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Poison_Chiefs.md', within the main section titled 'Poison Chiefs', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Poison Chief Fights and Boss Guides'.
The content is as follows:
You can expect it to throw out little orbs of poison continuously, covering the surrounding area and inflicting Poison Damage. Equip Antimiasma Powder so you can quickly use it if you get caught in one too many attacks.
